description: Test database for Alienated Majesty Books scraper with real book club events extracted from rendered HTML

schema.title: string (required) - Book club name or event title
schema.author: string (required) - Book author name
schema.date: string (required) - Event date in YYYY-MM-DD format

input.description: Rendered book clubs page with all book club events

expected_output.title: NYRB Book Club - Nightmare Alley
expected_output.author: William Lindsey Gresham
expected_output.description: Only the (NYRB) Classics. Meets the 1st Saturday of every month at 11am. Run by the Austin NYRB Book Club.

expected_output.title: NYRB Book Club - High Wind in Jamaica
expected_output.author: Richard Hughes
expected_output.description: Only the (NYRB) Classics. Meets the 1st Saturday of every month at 11am. Run by the Austin NYRB Book Club.

expected_output.description: Only the (NYRB) Classics. Meets the 1st Saturday of every month at 11am. Run by the Austin NYRB Book Club.
